revised_title: Two Cases of Insects Voided through the Urinary System
tldr: Dr. Daniel Turner shares two cases of insects being expelled through the urinary passage, one involving a child and the other a maggot-like insect. The child's worm was over 4 inches long and resembled earthworms, while the maggot had a red snout and a forked tail. These cases highlight the unusual and rare instances of insects being voided through the urinary system.
